name: Stackexchange change font, no ambiguous 'l'
additional_info:
Basically, the use of Arial/Helvetica makes a lot of things confusing due to the fact that 'l' and 'I' look the same. Additionally, Courier (in the <code> sections) makes 'l' and '1' look the same.

Thus body font is changed to the fabulous Georgia, and the code font is changed to Lucida Console
